details.name: description
details.old_value:
When using custom skill levels with some level disabled (f.e _skill_medic "20 -1 90 -1"_ ), a few minor issues appear:

* In the stats window, "Next level" is displayed as -1 (ie, 23/-1). We should rather display the next available level (ie, 90), or nothing at all if the last level isn't available
* Skill levels stars are still displayed, even if the intermediary level was not available. We should grey it out instead.
details.new_value:
When using custom skill levels with some level disabled (f.e _skill_medic "20 -1 90 -1"_ ), a few minor issues appear:

* In the stats window, "Next level" is displayed as -1 (ie, 23/-1). We should rather display the next available level (ie, 90), or nothing at all if the last level isn't available
* Skill levels stars are still displayed (in-game and debriefing screen), even if the intermediary level was not available. We should grey it out instead.

subject: Skill levels display -1 rather than next level when level is disabled
description:
When using custom skill levels with some level disabled (f.e _skill_medic "20 -1 90 -1"_ ), a few minor issues appear:

* In the stats window, "Next level" is displayed as -1 (ie, 23/-1). We should rather display the next available level (ie, 90), or nothing at all if the last level isn't available
* Skill levels stars are still displayed (in-game and debriefing screen), even if the intermediary level was not available. We should grey it out instead.
